definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: alive, living;—´[[ח]] Ge 25:6 +; [[חָָי]] Ge 3:20 +, [[חֵי]] Am 8:14 + 15 t. (Ew:§ 329 explains as cstr., but Ges:§ 93, R 7 n al. as contracted abs.); f. [[חַיׇּה]] Ge 1:20 +; pl. [[חַיִּים]] Ps 116:9 +;—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: of God, as the living one, the fountain of life [[אֵל חַי]] Jos 3:10 (J), Ho 2:1, Ps 42:3, Ps 84:3; [[אלהים חי]] 2Ki 19:4, 2Ki 19:16 = Is 37:4, Is 37:17; [[אלהים חיים]] De 5:23, 1Sa 17:26, 1Sa 17:36, Je 10:10, Je 23:36; [[חי יהוה]] Yahweh is living Ps 18:47 = 2Sa 22:47; [[גאלי חי]] my avenger is living Job 19:25; the formula of the oath is ´[[חַי י]] Ju Jdg 8:19, Ru 3:13, 1Sa 14:39, 1Sa 14:45, 1Sa 19:6, 1Sa 20:21, 1Sa 25:34, 1Sa 26:10, 1Sa 26:16, 1Sa 28:10, 1Sa 29:6, 2Sa 4:9, 2Sa 12:5, 2Sa 14:11, 2Sa 15:21, 1Ki 1:29, 1Ki 2:24, 1Ki 17:1, 1Ki 17:12, 1Ki 18:10, 1Ki 22:14 = 2Ch 18:13, 2Ki 5:16, 2Ki 5:20, Ho 4:15, Je 4:2, Je 5:2, Je 12:16, Je 16:14, Je 16:15, Je 23:7, Je 23:8 Je 38:16; [[חי אל]] Job 27:2; [[האלהים]] ´[[ח]] 2Sa 2:27; ´[[חי אדני י]] Je 44:26; [[חבאות]] ´[[תי י]] 1Ki 18:15, 2Ki 3:14; as used by God Himself it is [[חי אנכי]] De 32:40, elsewhere [[חי אני]] Nu 14:21, Nu 14:28 (P) Is 49:18, Je 22:24, Je 46:18, Ez Eze 5:11, Eze 14:16, Eze 14:18, Eze 14:20, Eze 16:48, Eze 17:16, Eze 17:19, Eze 18:3, Eze 20:3, Eze 20:31, Eze 20:33, Eze 33:11, Eze 33:27, Eze 34:8, Eze 35:6, Eze 35:11, Zep 2:9, cf. also [[חֵי דרך]] [[באר שׁבע]], [[חֵי אלהיך דן]] Am 8:14; with the exception of [[בְּחֵי הָעׂולָם]] by him who liveth for ever Da 12:7, ´[[חֵ]] is always (as an artificial distinction of scribes) used of non-sacred oaths, v.

definitions.title: b. b.
definitions.body: of man: [[אָדָם חַי]] a living man La 3:39, in antith [[מֵת]]:[[חי חי ]] Is 38:19; [[הַחַי]] collective Ec 7:2; Absalom 2Sa 19:7; Naboth 1Ki 21:15; a son or lad 2Sa 12:21, 1Ki 3:22, 1Ki 3:22, 1Ki 3:23, 1Ki 3:23, 1Ki 3:25, 1Ki 3:26, 1Ki 3:26, 1Ki 3:27, 1Ki 17:23; usually pl. [[חיים]] alive, living Nu 16:30, Nu 16:33 (J), Nu 17:13 (P), De 4:4, De 5:3, Is 8:19, Ps 55:16, Ps 124:3, Pr 1:12, Ec 4:2, Ec 4:2, Ec 4:15, Ec 6:8, Ec 9:4, Ec 9:5, Ru 2:20; taking prisoners alive Jos 8:23 (J) 1Sa 15:8, 1Ki 20:18, 1Ki 20:18, 2Ki 7:12, 2Ki 10:14, 2Ki 10:14, 2Ch 25:12; living (prosperously) 1Sa 25:6 (We rds. [[לָחִי]] = [[לְאָחִי]] (v. Klo Dr) to my brother, after Vulgate fratribus meis); elsewh. in phrase ([[פני]]) [[חיים על]] ([[אַתֶּם]])[[האדמה כל־הימים אשׁר הֵם ]] all the days that they (ye) live upon (the face of) of the land De 4:10, De 12:1, De 31:13, 1Ki 8:40 = 2Ch 6:31. Note phrases: ([[ים]]) [[עוֹד חַי]] yet alive Ge 25:6, Ge 43:7, Ge 43:27, Ge 43:28, Ge 45:28, Ge 46:30 (J), Ge 45:3, Ge 45:26, Ex 4:18 (E), De 31:27, 1Sa 20:14, 2Sa 12:22, 2Sa 18:14, 1Ki 20:32; [[בהיות חי]] 2Sa 12:18, 1Ki 12:6, 2Ch 10:6; [[חַיִים]]([[ה]])[[אֶרֶץ ]] land of the living Is 38:11, Is 53:8, Je 11:19, Ez Eze 26:20, Eze 32:23, Eze 32:24, Eze 32:25, Eze 32:26, Eze 32:27, Eze 32:32, Ps 27:13, Ps 52:7, Ps 142:6, Job 28:13; ´[[ארחות הח]] Ps 116:9; ´[[ספר ח]] Ps 69:29; ´[[חרור הח]] bundle of the living 1Sa 25:29; ´[[אור הח]] light of the living Job 33:30, Ps 56:14. In the oath by life of men [[חי]] is pointed always [[חֵי]]:[[חֵי אדני ]] [[המלך]] as my lord the king liveth 2Sa 15:21; [[חֵי פרעה]] Ge 42:15, Ge 42:16 (E); [[חֵי נַפְשְׁךָ]] 1Sa 1:26, 1Sa 17:55, 2Sa 14:19; ´[[חַ]] [[וְחֵי נַפְשְׁךָ]] ´[[י]] as Yahweh liveth and as thy soul (or thyself) liveth 1Sa 20:3, 1Sa 25:26, 2Ki 2:2, 2Ki 2:4, 2Ki 2:6, 2Ki 4:30 [[חַיֶּךָ]] ´[[וְחֵי נ]] 2Sa 11:11 (but on txt. v. We Dr).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of animals, alive, living: ox Ex 21:35, Ex 22:3 (E); goat Le 16:10, Le 16:20, Le 16:21 (P); bird Le 14:4, Le 14:6, Le 14:6, Le 14:7, Le 14:51, Le 14:53; dog, [[לְכֶלֶב]] [[חַי הוּא טוֹב מִן־הָאַרְיֵה הַמֵּת]] Ec 9:4 (comp. Ar. prov. Kelb ḥei wa-lâ meijit, a living dog and no dead lion Wetzst:Verhand. Berl. Anthrop. Ges. 1878, 388); reptiles Ge 1:28 (P); animals in general Ge 9:3 (P); [[בשׂר חי]] living, raw flesh Le 13:10, Le 13:14, Le 13:15, Le 13:15, Le 13:16 (P) 1Sa 2:15.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: animals and man, phrases for either or both: ´[[כל ח]] Ge 3:20, Ge 8:21 (J) Job 12:10, Job 28:21, Job 30:23, Ps 143:2, Ps 145:16; [[כל החי]] Ge 6:19 (P); [[נֶפֶשׁ חַיׇּה]] Ge 1:20, Ge 1:24, Ge 1:30 (P) Ge 2:7, Ge 2:19 (J); [[כל נֶפֶשׁ חַיׇּה]] Ge 9:12, Ge 9:15, Ge 9:16 (P) Ez Eze 47:9; [[כל נפשׁ החיה]] Ge 1:21, Ge 9:10, Le 11:10, Le 11:46 (P).

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: (dub.) of vegetation, as thorns, green, Ps 58:10 (Ges Ew Ol Pe, but De Ri Che Bae raw flesh, v.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: of water, flowing, fresh [[מים חיים]] Ge 26:19 (J), Le 14:5, Le 14:6, Le 14:50, Le 14:51, Le 14:52, Le 15:13, Nu 19:17 (P), Je 2:13, Je 17:13, Zec 14:8, Ct So 4:15.

(dub.) lively, active: [[אישׁ חַי]] an active man 2Sa 23:20 (but Qr [[אישׁ חַיִל]] is to be preferred); [[איבי חיים]] mine enemies are lively Ps 38:20 (RV, but Houb Ol Ew Hu Che al. rd. [[חִנׇּם]], ‖[[שׁקר]]).
reviving: [[כָּעֵת חַיׇּה]] at the time (when it is) reviving, the spring Ge 18:10, Ge 18:14 (J), 2Ki 4:16, 2Ki 4:17.
